attributes.action: Demand that Facebook should approve all groups created before they are made public
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think that Facebook should approve all groups that are created before they are made public. This is because people are allowed to created obscene and sick group pages. Although there is a way to report these groups, and they will eventually be deleted, it isn't happening quick enough and the damage will already have been done. If Facebook restrict the content of the groups, people will not have to put up with these disgusting people.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Facebook.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
